description:
This time... Umaru catches a cold, then takes care of Onii-chan when he gets a cold, works hard to make Hamburg steak with green peppers in it, gets disconnected from the world and is forced to go to a manga cafe for the first time, and then we get to see a glimpse of Onii-chan`s high school life.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Umaru and Now and Once Upon a Time
Umaru, das Jetzt und die Vergangenheit
Umaru, le présent et le passé
